Item ID22327

The Justiciar chestguard is part of the justiciar armour set requiring 75 Defence to equip. It is a rare drop from the Theatre of Blood.

Wearing the full Justiciar armour set grants the passive effect: all non-PvP combat damage is reduced by b o n u s 3000 {\displaystyle {\frac {bonus}{3000}}} , where bonus is the player's current defence bonus being rolled against by the attacker's attack style. For example, if an enemy attacks with crush and the player has a crush defence bonus of +450, then 15% (450/3,000) of the damage is reduced.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-40-20
 Defence bonuses
+132+130+117-16+142
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+4List

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Theatre of BloodN/A 12/172.9; 2/138.6

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Based on the statues found in the Hallowed Sepulchre and the dialogue and appearance of the ghostly knights encountered in its lobby, the Justiciar set of armour obtainable from the Theatre of Blood appears to be the armour of the Justiciar of the Wolf, who died long before the vampyre conflict reached Hallowvale.

[[File:Justiciar chestguard detail.png|left|160px]]
The '''Justiciar chestguard''' is part of the [[justiciar armour]] set requiring 75 [[Defence]] to equip. It is a rare drop from the [[Theatre of Blood]].

Wearing the full Justiciar armour set grants the [[passive effect]]: all non-[[PvP]] combat damage is reduced by <math>\frac{bonus}{3000}</math>, where ''bonus'' is the player's current defence bonus being rolled against by the attacker's [[attack style]]. For example, if an enemy attacks with [[crush]] and the player has a crush defence bonus of +450, then 15% (450/3,000) of the damage is reduced.

==Trivia==
